entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (greeter_mos_espa_hutt_recruiter.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_7a599b0f: What could be better or more profitable than flying for Jabba the Hutt? We have the best ships in space. Well, definitely the best that don't require you to be in the military. We'll start you off right, with a ship that's mostly space-worthy and with very few miles. You'll easily pay it off in only a few dozen years.
